Title: Edvard Eidum Card with Psalm Undated
Description: CHRISTMAS CARD FROM EDVARD EIDUM TO ALMA WILSON.  NO ENVELOPE, NO DATE.  THIS SEEMS TO BE A PSALM, WHICH WOULD BE HARD TO TRANSLATE.
Creator: Edvard Eidum
Siri Lawson
Text: These two verses basically talk about using your life to share the joys and sorrows of others, and quietly comfort and help where needed, with the help of God and Jesus
